column2: "Ana menndze moho a? Ana mennyɛ ɔsomafo a? Ana munnhun hɛn Ewuradze Jesus a? Ana nnyɛ hom nye m'edwuma wɔ Ewuradze mu a?"
"Sɛ mennyɛ ɔsomafo mma binom a
column3: hom dze meyɛ ma hom
column4: na m'asomafoyɛ ne nsɔwano nye hom wɔ Ewuradze mu."

column2: "Me nyiano a miyi kyerɛ hɔn a wɔpɛnsapɛnsa mo dwumadzi mu nye iyi."
"Ana yennyi ho kwan dɛ yedzidzi na yɛnom?"
"Ana yennyi ho kwan dɛ yɛdze ɔyer a ɔyɛ gyedzinyi nantsew
column3: dɛ asomafo nkaa no

column2: "Anaaso emi nye Barnabas nko na yennyi ho kwan dɛ yegyaa dwumadzi anaa?"
"Sordaanyi woana na ɔbɔ nankasa ne kaw kɔ sa? Woana na ɔyɛ wenyin ture na onndzi n'aba bi? Anaaso woana na ɔnyɛn anyɛmbowa na ɔnnom anyɛmbowa hɔn numfonsu bi?"
"Ana meka yi nyimpa afamu a
column3: na mbra no so nnka dɛm?"

column2: "Na wɔakyerɛw no wɔ Moses mbra no mu dɛ
column3: Mma nnkyekyer nantwi a ɔporow eburow no ano. Aso anantwi no na hɔn ho hia Nyankopɔn
column5: "anaa hɛn ntsi ara na ɔka dɛm? Ɛhɛɛ
column9: na nyia ɔporow eburow no yɛ no enyidado mu dɛ obenya mu bi."

column2: "Sɛ yeduaa sunsum ndzɛmba maa hom a
column3: ana ɔyɛ adze a ɔso biara dɛ yebobu hom honam mu ndzɛmba?"

column2: "Sɛ binom enya hom ho kwan yi bi a
column3: ana nnyɛ hɛn mbom a? Naaso yɛammfa kwan a ɔtse dɛm yi do
column5: amma yeennsiw Kraest asɛmpa no kwan."

column2: "Ana hom nnyim dɛ hɔn a wɔyɛ asɔr ho edwuma no dzi asɔrdan mu adze no bi? Na dɛ hɔn a wɔsom afɔrmbukyia ho no nye afɔrmbukyia no nya hɔn kyɛpɛn?"
"Dɛmara so na Ewuradze hyɛɛ dɛ hɔn a wɔka asɛmpa no ndzidzi asɛmpa no ho."
"Na emi dze
column3: mennyɛɛ yinom mu biara; eso mennkyerɛw yi dɛ wɔnyɛ dɛm mma me; na oye ma me dɛ mubowu mbom
column4: kyɛn dɛ obiara bɛma m'ahohyehyɛ ayɛ kwa."

column2: "Na sɛ meka asɛmpa no a
column3: minnyi biribi a medze hyehyɛ moho: na ehiasɛm da mo do
column4: na sɛ mannka asɛmpa no a

column2: "Na sɛ meyɛ yi mankasa me pɛ do a
column3: mowɔ akatua
column4: sɛ eso mannyɛ no mankasa me pɛ do mpo a
column5: wɔdze ofihwɛ edwuma ahyɛ me nsa."

column2: "Na afei m'akatua nye dza ɔwɔ hen? Ɔno nye dɛ sɛ meka asɛmpa no a
column3: mma memmfa akabɔ nnka asɛmpa no ho
column4: amma maammfa asɛmpa no ho kwan a mowɔ annyɛ adze ntrado."

column2: "Na kaansa midzi moho do wɔ nyimpa nyina afamu mpo a
column3: medze moho yɛɛ akowaa maa nyimpa nyina

column2: "Meyɛɛ Jewnyi maa Jewfo ama meenya Jewfo; hɔn a wɔwɔ mbra no ase no
column3: dɛ nyia ɔwɔ mbra no ase
column5: ) naaso meyɛɛ moho dɛ nyia ɔwɔ mbra no ase ama meenya hɔn a wɔwɔ mbra no ase:"

column2: "na hɔn a wonnyi mbra no ase no
column3: meyɛɛ dɛ minnyi mbra no ase maa hɔn
column4: (nnyɛ dɛ minnyi mbra ase wɔ Nyankopɔn afamu
column5: na mbom mowɔ mbra ase wɔ Kraest afamu) ama meenya hɔn a wonnyi mbra no ase no."

column2: "Hɔn a wɔyɛ mberɛw no
column3: meyɛɛ dɛ nyia ɔyɛ mberɛw maa hɔn
column4: ama meenya hɔn a wɔyɛ mberɛw. Mayɛ moho adze nyina ama nyimpa nyina
column5: ama menam akwan nyina mu maagye binom nkwa."

column2: "Na iyi nyina asɛmpa no ntsi na meyɛ
column3: ama meenya ho bi."

column2: "Ana hom nnyim dɛ hɔn a wosi empire wɔ mbirikatu mu no
column3: hɔn nyina tu dze
column4: naaso ɔbaako na onya empiresi abadobɔdze no a? Dɛmara na hom so ntu mbirika
column5: ama hom so hom eenya abadobɔdze no."

column2: "Na obiara a ɔreper edzi nkonyim wɔ empiresi mu no
column3: ɔhyɛ noho do wɔ adze nyina mu; hɔn dze wɔyɛ ma woeenya abɔtsir a ɔsɛɛ
column4: na hɛn dze dza ɔnnsɛɛ a."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi emi dze
column3: mbirika a mutu yi
column6: monntow no dɛ dza morotow gu mframa mu ara gyan."

column2: "Mbom mehyɛ mo honam amen
column3: na midzi no nya
column4: ama maka asɛmpa akyerɛ binom ekyir no
